sourcesContent:
<form [formGroup]="formReview">
    <input 
    type="text" class="form-control" 
    name="reviewText" id="inputText" 
    formControlName="reviewText"
    [ngClass]="reviewNotValid"
    >
    <input type="text" class="form-control" name="overall" id="inputOverall" formControlName="overall">
</form>
